text: haey chaur anak dakdai robsa anak chaul tow knong haobaw robsa anak noh vea nung chenh ponlu sa chengchang daoy minmen chea brakear akrak laey . haey chaur anak yk dai( sda) robsa anak dak chaul tow chamhieng khluon( khangchevng) robsa anak daembi chiesaveang pi karphyokhlach . dau che neah teangpir nih kuchea phosdo tang pi mcheasa robsa anak towkean hvie r aon ning puok m ndrei robsa ke . pitabrakd nasa puokke kuchea krom del brasa chak pi kar brate b tde mk champoh yeung
